Parameters Schema:
```json
{
  "user_provider_id": {
    "type": "string",
    "description": "Unique identifier linking a user to the installed integration. Generated by the integration (UUID format)"
  },
  "user_id": {
    "type": "integer",
    "description": "Pipedrive user ID"
  },
  "company_id": {
    "type": "integer",
    "description": "Pipedrive company ID"
  },
  "marketplace_client_id": {
    "type": "string",
    "description": "Pipedrive Marketplace client ID of the installed integration"
  }
}
```
